recipe.title: Fennel and Celery Salad (Dama Bianca)
ingredients: 6 pale inner (white) celery stalks, leaves discarded and stalks thinly sliced
1/2 tablespoon grated lemon zest (preferably from an unwaxed organic lemon)
6 tablespoons good-quality fruity extra-virgin olive oil
instructions: Halve fennel lengthwise, then thinly slice crosswise about 1/4 inch thick. Toss with celery and arrange on a platter with mozzarella. Whisk together zest, juice, oil, sea salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper and drizzle over salad.
